item.title: 印度通过法案禁止用钱玩网络游戏
item.description: 印度政府周四通过了一项法案，禁止用钱玩网络游戏。【原文：India's government on Thursday passed a bill to ban online games played with money.】

item.title: 强生将投资 20 亿美元促进美国制造业发展，因为药品关税迫在眉睫
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府可能征收药品进口关税之际，强生公司周四承诺在北卡罗来纳州投资 20 亿美元，以扩大该制药商在美国的生产规模。【原文：Johnson & Johnson committed to invest $2 billion in North Carolina on Thursday to expand the drugmaker's U.S. manufacturing presence as potential drug import duties from President Donald Trump's administration loom.】

item.title: 聚焦：烟草业巨头尝试新策略，与不受管制的吸气饮料作斗争：加入其中
item.description: 美国是世界上最大的吸烟替代品市场，英美烟草公司多年来一直反对在美国销售未经授权的一次性吸管，游说立法者并在法庭上积极辩称这种吸管是非法的。【原文：British American Tobacco for years fought the sale of unauthorised, disposable vapes in the U.S. - the world's largest market for smoking alternatives - lobbying lawmakers and arguing aggressively in court that they were illegal.】

item.title: 据《新闻报》报道，Mediobanca 股东拒绝 Generali 银行的收购要约
item.description: 据《新闻报》周四报道，商业银行 Mediobanca 的股东拒绝了该公司首席执行官阿尔贝托-纳格尔（Alberto Nagel）提出的收购通用银行（Banca Generali）的建议，从而使这一本可造就意大利最大财富管理公司的收购计划落空。【原文：Shareholders of merchant bank Mediobanca have rejected the proposal of its chief executive Alberto Nagel to buy Banca Generali, daily la Stampa reported on Thursday, dashing a takeover that would have created Italy's largest wealth manager.】

item.title: 消息人士称，KKR 是以 6.1 亿美元出售日产总部的主要竞标者
item.description: 周四，一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，KKR 是收购汽车制造商日产汽车横滨总部的主要候选者，其出价约为 900 亿日元（约合 6.098 亿美元）。【原文：KKR is the leading candidate to buy the Yokohama headquarters of automaker Nissan Motor and has offered around 90 billion yen ($609.80 million), a source familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国考虑推出人民币支持的稳定币，以提高全球货币使用量
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，中国正在考虑首次允许使用人民币支持的稳定币，以促进人民币在全球的广泛使用，这是中国对数字资产立场的一次重大逆转。【原文：China is considering allowing the usage of yuan-backed stablecoins for the first time to boost wider adoption of its currency globally, sources familiar with the matter said, in a major reversal of its stance towards digital assets.】

item.title: 欧元区 8 月份商业活动加速，新订单增长，PMI 显示
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，尽管出口持续疲软，但欧元区企业的新订单在 8 月份出现了自 2024 年 5 月以来的首次增长，帮助整体活动以 15 个月来最快的速度扩张。【原文：Euro zone businesses saw new orders increase for the first time since May 2024 in August, helping overall activity expand at the fastest pace in 15 months despite persistent weakness in exports, a survey said on Thursday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯下令在所有手机和平板电脑上预装由国家支持的应用程序--WhatsApp 的竞争对手
item.description: 俄罗斯政府周四表示，从下个月起，所有手机和平板电脑都必须预装一款由俄罗斯政府支持、被视为 WhatsApp 竞争对手的信使应用程序。【原文：A Russian state-backed messenger application cast as a rival to WhatsApp which critics have said could be used for surveillance purposes must be pre-installed on all mobile phones and tablets from next month, the Russian government said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 HB 报道，特斯拉在德国工厂发生火灾后疏散了部分员工
item.description: 据《Handelsblatt 报》周四报道，特斯拉位于德国的一座加工电池组的厂房发生火灾，特斯拉已于周一撤离了部分厂房，但没有造成人员伤亡或环境破坏。【原文：Tesla has since Monday evacuated part of its plant in Germany after a fire broke out in a building processing battery packs, the Handelsblatt newspaper reported on Thursday, adding there were no injuries or environmental damage.】

item.title: 印度禁止网络货币游戏后，印度纳扎拉科技公司（Nazara Tech）创下两日跌幅纪录
item.description: 印度议会下议院通过了一项禁止涉及金钱赌注的网络游戏的法案，分析师警告说，该法案可能会使网络游戏行业 "不可行"，纳扎拉科技公司（Nazara Tech）的股价在两个交易日内暴跌超过 21%，并在周四创下两天来的最大跌幅。【原文：Shares of Nazara Tech slumped over 21% in two sessions and were headed for their steepest two-day fall on Thursday, after India’s lower house of parliament passed a bill banning online games involving monetary stakes, which analysts warned could make the sector "infeasible".】

item.title: Shoprite 旗下的 Checkers 在南非试用高科技购物推车
item.description: 南非 Checkers 超市的店主 Shoprite 表示，购物者很快就可以使用 "智能 "手推车购物，这种手推车可以让他们知道自己花了多少钱，而且还内置了支付终端。【原文：Shoppers at Checkers supermarkets in South Africa could soon be cruising the aisles with "smart" trolleys that let them know how much money they are spending and include in-built payment terminals, the chain's owner Shoprite said.】

item.title: 德国制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，8 月份德国制造业小幅增长
item.description: 周四的一项调查显示，德国私营部门经济在 8 月份略有增长，主要是受制造业新订单增加的推动。【原文：Germany's private sector economy saw a slight uptick in growth in August, driven primarily by the manufacturing sector which experienced a rise in new orders, according to a survey on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国经济困境拖累新兴市场货币，人民币空头押注创五月新高
item.description: 路透社周四的一项民意调查显示，对中国人民币的看跌押注创下了5月中旬以来的新高，分析师们在对中国经济日益加剧的担忧中首次转而看空人民币。【原文：Bearish bets on China's yuan hit their highest since mid-May, with analysts turning short for the first time amid mounting concerns over the economy, a Reuters poll showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，三菱将因后舱盖问题召回超过 91,000 辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周四表示，三菱汽车公司将在美国召回91697辆欧蓝德和欧蓝德混合动力SUV，原因是后舱盖存在意外掉落的风险。【原文：Mitsubishi Motors is recalling 91,697 Outlander and Outlander hybrid SUVs in the U.S. over risks of the rear hatch falling unexpectedly, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Thursday.】

item.title: 欧洲股市持平，杰克逊霍尔备受关注
item.description: 周四，欧洲股市变化不大，投资者在等待美联储杰克逊霍尔研讨会的最新消息，以寻找货币政策走向的线索。【原文：European equities were little changed on Thursday as investors awaited updates from the Federal Reserve's Jackson Hole symposium for clues on the path of monetary policy.】

item.title: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 发布升级版人工智能模型
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司深鉴科技（DeepSeek）在微信公众号上发表声明称，该公司周四发布了DeepSeek-V3.1，这是一个升级版模型，具有混合推理结构、更快的思维速度和更强的代理能力。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek on Thursday released DeepSeek-V3.1, an upgraded model with hybrid inference structure, faster thinking speed and stronger agent capability, the company said in a statement published on WeChat.】

item.title: 英国 M&S 投资 4.57 亿美元建设机器人仓库，以促进食品业务发展
item.description: 英国零售商玛莎百货公司（Marks & Spencer）周四表示，该公司将投资 3.4 亿英镑（4.57 亿美元）在英格兰中部建立一个自动化配送中心，以提高产能，支持其食品业务规模翻番的雄心。【原文：British retailer Marks & Spencer will invest 340 million pounds ($457 million) in an automated distribution centre in central England, building capacity to support its ambition to double the size of its food business, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国 WH Smith 下调北美业务利润展望
item.description: 英国旅游零售商 WH Smith 周四下调了其北美分部的全年利润展望，因为在一次审查中发现了与供应商收入有关的多报收益。【原文：British travel retailer WH Smith lowered its full-year profit outlook for its North America division on Thursday after a review uncovered an overstatement of earnings linked to supplier income.】

item.title: 亚洲富裕投资者寻求在投资组合中加入更多加密货币
item.description: 在数字资产走俏、主流应用增加以及主要市场有利监管发展的推动下，亚洲富裕家族和家族办公室正在加大加密货币投资。【原文：Wealthy Asian families and family offices are ramping up their cryptocurrency investments, driven by the bullishness around digital assets, increased mainstream adoption and favourable regulatory developments in key markets.】

item.title: 借着 Wegovy 的东风，诺和诺德将员工人数增加了一倍。现在裁员迫在眉睫
item.description: 随着诺和诺德减肥药 Wegovy 的热销，这家丹麦制药商迅速扩大了生产能力和销售范围，并大肆招聘员工，五年来员工人数几乎翻了一番。【原文：As Novo Nordisk's sales of its blockbuster weight-loss drug Wegovy boomed, the Danish drugmaker raced to expand manufacturing capacity and sales outreach with a hiring spree that almost doubled staff numbers over five years.】

item.title: 美国关税迫在眉睫，印度收益下调幅度居亚洲之首
item.description: 印度公司的盈利下调幅度是亚洲最大的，分析师们纷纷下调了预测，原因是美国的巨额关税加剧了经济增长的风险，即使拟议的国内减税措施有助于缓解这一影响。【原文：Indian companies have seen the steepest earnings downgrades in Asia, with analysts slashing forecasts as steep U.S. tariffs heighten risks to growth even if proposed domestic tax cuts help cushion the impact.】

item.title: 早间竞标杰克逊霍尔将在特朗普的阴影下开幕
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 市场为杰克逊霍尔会议做好准备，美元漂移，亚洲股市涨跌不一
item.description: 周四，美元在一周高点下方徘徊，亚洲股市涨跌互现，投资者正在为美联储杰克逊霍尔年度研讨会三天来可能影响市场的消息做准备。【原文：The U.S. dollar hovered below a one-week high on Thursday and Asian stock markets were broadly mixed as investors braced for three days of potentially market-moving news from the Federal Reserve's annual symposium in Jackson Hole.】

item.title: 投资者在鲍威尔讲话前思考美联储的独立性，美元随之漂移
item.description: 在本周晚些时候美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发表可能影响利率前景的讲话之前，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）又一次对美联储进行了攻击，投资者对美联储的独立性感到担忧，美元周四震荡走低。【原文：The U.S. dollar drifted on Thursday as investors fretted about the Federal Reserve's independence after yet another attack from President Donald Trump ahead of remarks from Chair Jerome Powell later this week that could influence the outlook for rates.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Meta 公司冻结人工智能招聘
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，Meta Platforms 在招聘了 50 多名研究人员和工程师后，暂停了人工智能部门的招聘工作。【原文：Meta Platforms has paused hiring in its artificial intelligence division after bringing on more than 50 researchers and engineers, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新西兰斥资 16 亿美元购买美国海上直升机和空客喷气机
item.description: 新西兰周四表示，将斥资 27 亿新西兰元（16 亿美元）购买五架 MH-60R 海鹰直升机和两架空中客车 A321XLR 飞机，这是新西兰决定更换老旧国防舰队后的第一笔重大投资。【原文：New Zealand said on Thursday it would spend NZ$2.7 billion ($1.6 billion) to buy five MH-60R Seahawk helicopters and two Airbus A321XLR aircraft, the first major investment following a decision to replace the country's aging defence fleet.】

item.title: 美国库存减少表明需求强劲，油价上涨
item.description: 油价周四小幅上涨，原因是全球最大的石油消费国美国的原油和燃料库存降幅大于预期，支持了需求稳定的预期。【原文：Oil prices gained slightly on Thursday as larger-than-expected declines crude oil and fuel inventories in the U.S., the world's biggest oil user, supported expectations for steady demand.】

item.title: 新西兰恒天然集团上调年度牛奶价格预期，原因是乳制品价格稳定
item.description: 新西兰恒天然合作社集团（Fonterra Co-operative Group）周四上调了对2024/2025产季牛奶价格的预测，认为全球乳制品价格稳定，销售业绩稳健。【原文：New Zealand's Fonterra Co-operative Group on Thursday increased its milk price forecast for the 2024/2025 season, banking on stable global dairy prices and solid sales book.】

item.title: 澳大利亚银行监管机构警告地缘政治紧张局势可能导致更多网络攻击
item.description: 澳大利亚审慎监管机构警告说，由于地缘政治紧张局势不断升级，该国银行系统面临的网络攻击风险越来越大。【原文：Australia's prudential regulator has cautioned that the country's banking system is facing increasing risk of cyberattacks as a result of escalating geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 中国福利改革面临关键考验，法院裁决打击就业和小企业
item.description: 中国最高法院裁定企业和员工逃避缴纳社会保险属于违法行为，这激起了人们对就业和小企业生存的担忧，迫使中国政府正视长期承诺的福利改革的风险。【原文：China's top court ruling that makes it illegal for businesses and employees to avoid social insurance payments is stoking fears about jobs and the survival of small firms, forcing Beijing to confront the risks of long-promised welfare reform.】
